description: A flute that can transform into a giant demon. Whoever hears Lullaby`s song (aside from the caster) will die. Erigor hoped to use this to kill the Guild Masters at their meeting. As Kageyama failed to carry out the mission due to being changed, Lullaby transformed into its demon form to feast on souls. However, Natsu Dragneel, Gray Fullbuster, and Erza Scarlet were able to defeat the demon flute. It currently is in the Council`s hands.
name: Lullaby
